Name: Deep Below
About the game: Deep Below is a 3D platform/adventure, featuring support of the Oculus VR headset, where you are lost underground and try to make your way to the surface using a mysterious gauntlet. You will have to overcome a series of challenges to your skills, traverse marvels of steel and stone and survive hazardous environments before your journey is over. Deep Below is a project made by students of the Art Institute of Vancouver, over the period of a year.
Meta Title: Deep Below: Sep 23, 2016, Confused Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Deep Below? Check out the release date (Sep 23, 2016), developer insights from Confused Studios, and a complete game summary.
